statements: SELECT * FROM property_ownership;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM property_ownership;
SELECT * FROM property_ownership WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, ownership_date FROM property_ownership;
SELECT owner_name, owner_id FROM property_ownership WHERE ownership_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM property_ownership WHERE owner_id = 1 ORDER BY ownership_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, owner_name FROM property_ownership WHERE property_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, ownership_date FROM property_ownership WHERE ownership_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT owner_id FROM property_ownership WHERE owner_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_properties, MAX(ownership_date) AS latest_ownership_date FROM property_ownership;
SELECT * FROM property_ownership
SELECT property_id, owner_id, timestamp FROM property_ownership ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT property_id, owner_id FROM property_ownership WHERE owner_id = 1
SELECT property_id, owner_id FROM property_ownership WHERE property_id IN (1, 2, 3)
SELECT property_id, owner_id, timestamp FROM property_ownership INNER JOIN ownership_history ON property_ownership.property_id = ownership_history.property_id
SELECT * FROM property_ownership WHERE owner_id = 10 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT property_id, owner_id, timestamp FROM property_ownership WHERE property_id > 100 AND owner_id <> 20;
SELECT history_id, property_id, previous_owner_id, new_owner_id, timestamp FROM ownership_history WHERE new_owner_id = 30 ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT TOP 5 property_id, owner_id, timestamp FROM property_ownership WHERE owner_id = 40;
SELECT property_id, owner_id, timestamp FROM property_ownership WHERE property_id BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM property_ownership;
SELECT id, owner_id, timestamp FROM property_ownership WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT id, name, address FROM owner ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT AVG(property_id) AS avg_property_id, owner_id FROM property_ownership GROUP BY owner_id;
SELECT id, previous_owner_id, new_owner_id, change_timestamp FROM ownership_history ORDER BY change_timestamp;
SELECT * FROM property_ownership WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT id, property_id, owner_id, timestamp FROM property_ownership ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT property_id, owner.name AS owner_name, owner.address AS owner_address, timestamp FROM property_ownership INNER JOIN owner ON property_ownership.owner_id = owner.id;

SELECT property_id, previous_owner.name AS previous_owner_name, new_owner.name AS new_owner_name, change_timestamp FROM ownership_history INNER JOIN owner AS previous_owner ON ownership_history.previous_owner_id = previous_owner.id INNER JOIN owner AS new_owner ON ownership_history.new_owner_id = new_owner.id;
SELECT property_id, owner_id, timestamp FROM property_ownership WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_name, property_value FROM Property WHERE property_value > 1000;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM Owner WHERE owner_address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT * FROM OwnershipHistory ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT network_id, network_name FROM BlockchainNetwork WHERE network_location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM Property;
SELECT property_name, property_value FROM Property ORDER BY property_value DESC;
SELECT owner_name, owner_address FROM Owner WHERE owner_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM OwnershipHistory WHERE transaction_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT network_name, network_location FROM BlockchainNetwork WHERE network_location = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_name, owner_id FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_id DESC;
SELECT property_address FROM properties WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT property_address, owner_name FROM properties JOIN property_owners ON properties.owner_id = property_owners.owner_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_owners
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM property_owners ORDER BY owner_id DESC
SELECT property_id, property_address, owner_id FROM properties WHERE owner_id = 1
SELECT property_id, property_address, owner_name FROM properties JOIN property_owners ON properties.owner_id = property_owners.owner_id
SELECT block_id, block_hash, block_timestamp FROM blockchain ORDER BY block_timestamp DESC
